response.overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.
response.tagline: His fear began when he woke up alone. His terror began when he realised he wasn't.
response.title: 28 Days Later

titles.title: 28 วันให้หลัง เชื้อเขมือบคน
